Class BaseFromToQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.reporting.query.impl.AbstractQueryBuilder
      src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.reporting.query.impl.BaseFromToQueryBuilder

class BaseFromToQueryBuilder
extends AbstractQueryBuilder

Adds from-to support to AbstractQueryBuilder

see:
org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.reporting.query.impl.AbstractQueryBuilder
author:
Gonzalo Javier Clavell
since:
2-Mar-2009

Property Summary
def fromValue

From value

def fromValueString

From value as come in params

def toValue

To value

def toValueString

To value as come in params

 
Constructor Summary
BaseFromToQueryBuilder(def prop, def valueString, def queryObject)

Contructor Sets fromValue and toValue from valueString passed as param

 
Method Summary
def build()

Adds string query to queryObject's queryString and parameters to If there is no from value or no to value builds simple query e.g : x >= 10; x <= 5 If two values are defined builds fromToQuery e.g : between 5 and 10

def buildSimpleQuery()

Builds query when from value or to value are no defined

def getValueFromValueString(def string)

Basic getValueFromValueString Each type supported by query builder (subclasses) must override this method in order to return the right type

def setFromToValues(def valueString)

Sets fromValueString, toValueString, fromValue, and toValue from valueString
